outputs.output_descr: This project aims to Promote Low Carbon Energy Solutions in Nigeria Energy/Power Supply towards Energy for All and Reduce disaster and environmental vulnderability to economic and human activities,including urbanization and Climate Change through efficient use of natural rources,effective disaster preparedness and reformed regulatory framework aligned with Nigeria's international commitments,and enforced at Federal,State and Local levels.

project_descr: Promoting Low Carbon Energy Solutions in Nigeria Energy/Power Supply
project_title: PPG: Promoting Low Carbon Energy Solutions In Nigeria
